entry.title: WIND WARNING , St. Thomas
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:50 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 11.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 2:36 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

Temperature: 11.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 89 %

Wind: SW 29 km/h gust 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Showers at times heavy. High 10.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 60 gusting to 100 this afternoon. High 10. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 100 diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
